channel.title: NPC Drops
channel.description: Well, i download Homiescape, 317. There is an NPC, ID: 50. He drops items, but he isn't in the NPCDrop list?! And when i add a NPC with the items, he doesn't drop it?!

item.title: NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“VestaPK, post:13, topic:337528”]that means the NPC drops more than one item and I forgot the drop rate sorry.
I dont add NPCs or drops now cause mines finish I just do little updates for bugs/glitchs or commands ect.
And Natey you’re Sig? ROFL kid.
This isn’t the only RuneScape Private Server site you know.
And I didn’t need help from these guys.
I joined and mostly just help people.[/quote]“kid”.
Funny guy we have here, too damn bad I’m 15, about to hit 16 bro.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“VestaPK, post:16, topic:337528”][quote author=Natey link=topic=433929.msg3186213#msg3186213 date=1271785628]

that means the NPC drops more than one item and I forgot the drop rate sorry.
I dont add NPCs or drops now cause mines finish I just do little updates for bugs/glitchs or commands ect.
[/quote]In Delta sources it’s not all clumped together, mine looks like:

//abbysal
npcdrop = 2263	5509	1	10
npcdrop = 2263	5510	1	17
npcdrop = 2263	5512	1	15
npcdrop = 2263	5514	1	12
npcdrop = 2263	526	1	100
npcdrop = 2264	5509	1	100
npcdrop = 2264	5510	1	7
npcdrop = 2264	5512	1	5
npcdrop = 2264	5514	1	2
npcdrop = 2264	526	1	100
npcdrop = 2265	5509	1	10
npcdrop = 2265	5510	1	27
npcdrop = 2265	5512	1	25
npcdrop = 2265	5514	1	22
npcdrop = 2265	526	1	100

That’s my drops for the abyssal monsters in the Runecrafting abyss.

So? It can be

npcdrop = 2265 5514 1 22 526 1 100 [/quote]if you’re using a allstar source I think.

Read full topic

npcdrop = 2265	5514	1	22
npcdrop = 2265	526	1	100

That’s my drops for the abyssal monsters in the Runecrafting abyss.[/quote]

So? It can be

npcdrop = 2265	5514	1	22	526	1	100

item.title: NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

VestaPk, that’s wrong.

npcdrop = 2265(NPC's ID)	526(Item ID)	1(Amount of item dropped)	100(The Drop rate of the item; the rarity of it)

it’s very simple

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @VestaPK VestaPK
item.description:

Oh right sorry.
Are the

npcdrop = 1"     "1"      "1

Spaces? Or Tab?

Have you got TeamViewer.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

Learn to read.

i sayd: did you THINK i did:
npcdrop = 1 1

BTW: You are wrong. The 2nd is the droptype.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @VestaPK VestaPK
item.description:
@VestaPK wrote:

Dude thats where you went wrong its:

npcdrop = 1      1      1

First number is NPC ID
Secound number is Amount of Item
Third number is Item ID.

Seriously man… thats the basics wait till you want to add other stuff.

Is it just me or am I educating all the noobs around here?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

npcdrop = 1 1

Did you think i just added that in npcdrops, or are u telling me that i added an random ID of an item that doesn’te exist?

Read full topic
